definition: General Than Shwe (1933-), Myanmar army officer and politician, leader of the military junta 1992-2011
Than Shwe (1933-), Myanmar general and politician, president of Myanmar 1992-2011

sentences.english: Recently, Than Shwe concluded a five-day state visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 最近，丹瑞结束对中国为期五天的国事访问。

sentences.english: Whenever Vice Snr-Gen Maung Aye wants to see Snr-Gen Than Shwe, he needs permission first.
sentences.chinese: 每当孟诶副大将希望会见丹瑞大将，他需要许可。

sentences.english: Than Shwe well knows how a low-profile subordinate can overthrow the leader.
sentences.chinese: 丹瑞深知一个低调的属下能够对其上级进行颠覆。

sentences.english: If they are not elected, Than Shwe grand plan is over.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们得不到推选，那么丹瑞的重大计划就会泡汤。

sentences.english: Than Shwe also briefed Jiang Zemin on the domestic situation in Myanmar.
sentences.chinese: 丹瑞主席还向江主席介绍了缅甸国内形势。

sentences.english: Than Shwe, now in his late-70s, could find the choice difficult.
sentences.chinese: 丹瑞，现在已经70多岁后期，发现甚难选择。

sentences.english: Senior army leaders reportedly told guests that the military supremo was readying to take a back seat.
sentences.chinese: 据说军队高级领导人透露，丹瑞已经决定退居二线。

sentences.english: It turned out to be Ne Win’s biggest mistake in his life.
sentences.chinese: 对丹瑞的提拔后来证明是奈温将军一生中最大的错误。

sentences.english: He is urging the general to release political prisoners, including opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文敦促丹瑞释放包括昂山素季在内的反对派领袖。

sentences.english: The new government is running under Snr-Gen Than Shwe's guidance.
sentences.chinese: 新政府正在丹瑞的指导下运转。

sentences.english: On behalf of the Myanmar government and people, Than Shwe expressed warm welcome to Wen's visit and asked Wen to extend his regards to President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 丹瑞请温家宝转达致胡锦涛主席的问候。

sentences.english: Darren Sharp is looking forward to "augmented reality via mobile devices [and] serious location-based services."
sentences.chinese: 丹瑞盼望通过移动装置和严格的定位服务增强现实性。

definition: Hun Sen (1952-), prime minister of Cambodia since 1985
Aung San (1915-1947), Burmese general and politician, hero of Myanmar independence movement and father of Aung San Su Kyi 昂山素季[Ang2 Shan1 Su4 Ji4]
Weidong district of Pingdingshan city 平頂山市|平顶山市[Ping2 ding3 shan1 shi4], Henan
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
Maliki or Al-Maliki (name)/Nouri Kamel al-Maliki (1950-) prime minister of Iraq from 2006
